jcr:content.jcr:title: List of Scottish council areas by population

contentheadline.headline: List of Scottish council areas by population

contentrichtext.text: This is a '''list of council areas of Scotland ordered by population'''.The populations of these [[Scotland|Scottish]] [[council areas]] are mid-year estimates for 2010 from the [[Office for National Statistics]]. {| class="wikitable sortable" ! Rank !! Council area !!
